Comments_List: Information on pilgrimage studies and pilgrimage practices. History of Catholicism in China
learned more about religious pilgrimage in china and tibet, some theoretical frameworks of pilgrimage, and tourism as well

Strengths: Diverse body of readings.

Weaknesses: Bi-weekly meetings. Lack of in-seminar engagement on part of many students. Lack of feedback concerning running grade in seminar.
great course, i think the co-teaching method worked well

Depending on their interests, yes. The readings and theoretical materials were interesting, though, outside of interest in religious studies or pilgrimage studies, students may get less out of seminar.
yes, would definitely recommend. a unique course taught by great professors, though I don't think it'll be offered again
